jsonError.description:
⚠️ JSON Parse Error: {{error}}

The implementation_plan.json file is malformed. Run the backend auto-fix or manually repair the file.

merge.timeoutWithOutput: Merge process timed out. Some output was received - please run `git status` in your project directory to check if the merge completed partially.
merge.timeoutNoOutput: Merge process timed out. No output received - the merge may not have started.
